directions: Combine butternut squash and apple juice in a slow cooker. Whisk butter, brown sugar, and cinnamon together in a bowl; drizzle over butternut squash.
Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours.
ingredients: 1 (3 pound) butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into cubes
title: Slow Cooker Butternut Squash
